title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 160.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 160.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This regulation implements the legislative intent of
article 13 of the Labor Law which requires strict control and gradual
elimination of homework. It establishes procedures for the issuance of employer
permits and homeworker certificates and provisions for the suspension and
revocation of the permits and certificates. The regulation also establishes a
procedure for the issuance of variations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
160.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
